column7: Study of leadership theories and their application to the development of leadership skills. Students develop a personal philosophy of leadership, prepare a development plan for enhancing leadership skills, and begin a portfolio to record their leadership growth. Explores topics concerning diversity, ethics, and leadership/follower roles.
column10: Social & Beh Sci - Soc Sci course.
column11: Students must sign up for one lecture and one discussion. Please make sure you only sign up for ONE discussion section, not multiple.
